plugin.name: snmptrapd
plugin.description: Implementation of an SNMP Trapd that forwards incoming traps as events

c:simple-property.name: port
c:simple-property.description: The port to listen on (Note: ports less than 1024 require root access on unixoids)

c:simple-property.name: community
c:simple-property.description: The community string for SNMP v1 and v2c

c:simple-property.name: eventSeverityOid
c:simple-property.description: OID of a String that determines the severity of the generated event
